definition: soon/in a moment/to look on as sth happens
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

to act like a snob

sentences.english: For these letters, Yan Shu never really seen.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些情书，颜姝从没正眼看过。

sentences.english: You're getting really the first time what I'm seeing "extreme have's" and starting to get "have not's"
sentences.chinese: 我真的第一次亲眼看到“极富”和“极贫”现象。

sentences.english: See the martial arts will be crowned and win the game.
sentences.chinese: 眼看武馆馆主将要反败为胜。

sentences.english: I saw my husband murdered before me.
sentences.chinese: 我眼看着我的丈夫被杀害。

sentences.english: He watches as the crane is loaded onto a truck.
sentences.chinese: 随后他又亲眼看到吊车装到卡车。

sentences.english: He threw the snakeskin into the fire and watched it burn.
sentences.chinese: 他把蛇皮扔进炉子里，眼看着被火烧成了灰烬。

sentences.english: It's getting colder now pretty quickly.
sentences.chinese: 眼看天气很快又要变凉。

sentences.english: Lifted his eyes to the heavens, and, folding his hands as in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 他抬眼看着天空，合起双手，像儿时那样。

sentences.english: But the war did come. I saw my boyhood friends blown to bits.
sentences.chinese: 但战争来了，我亲眼看到我儿时的伙伴们被炸成碎片。

sentences.english: I know they are up to the challenge — and I plan to be around to see it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道他们会迎接这一挑战，我也会亲眼看到的。

sentences.english: Ken White saw the earth, but to his loyalty to the national report.
sentences.chinese: 肯将白眼看尘世，但使丹心报国民。

sentences.english: Based on this, I childlike watch scenery of hometown and touch affection of Guanyi.
sentences.chinese: 我用我的童眼看家乡景，我用童心感受莞邑情。

sentences.english: I see what the American people are doing today and every day.
sentences.chinese: 我亲眼看到了美国人民今天和以后每一天都在做的事。

sentences.english: Fruit tree, fruit tree, open your eyes to another year.
sentences.chinese: 果树阿果树，张开你的眼看向未来。

sentences.english: See LiuMin seems to some let go, victory however because be has no head for wine drunk.
sentences.chinese: 眼看刘敏似乎有些松口，胜利却因不胜酒力醉倒了。

sentences.english: I crept up the stairs and peered into the office of optical shop.
sentences.chinese: 我爬上楼梯，眯缝着眼看了看眼镜店的办公室。
